game.name: LAPIN
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: LAPIN(라핀)은 용감한 토끼 탐험대의 모험을 다룬 2D 정밀 플랫포머 게임입니다. 정교한 컨트롤으로 목숨을 위협하는 장애물을 돌파하고, 새로운 만남, 아름다운 풍경들로 가득한 모험을 떠나 보세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: LAPIN is a 2D precision platformer game featuring a group of brave rabbit explorers. Break through life-threatening obstacles with precise controls, and embark on an adventure filled with new encounters and stunning landscapes!
